member.name: T:Microsoft.Graphics.Canvas.Effects.CropEffect
member.summary: Crops an image, outputting only a specified region.

remarks.p: Note that cropping changes the bounds of the image, but does not move it. If you also want to move the cropped area to the origin, combine this with a 2D translation or use .
This Windows Runtime type corresponds to the D2D Crop effect.
